description: CSS is used to style and design web pages. It controls layout, colors, fonts and responsiveness.

topics.title: Introduction to CSS
topics.english: CSS stands for Cascading Style Sheets. It is used to style HTML elements and control how they appear on screen.
topics.hinglish: CSS ka full form Cascading Style Sheets hai. Agar HTML structure hai, to CSS uska design aur look decide karta hai.

practice.question: What does CSS stand for?
What is the role of CSS?
practice.answer: To style and design HTML elements

topics.title: Why CSS is Important
topics.english: CSS helps control design, layout and responsiveness of websites from a single place.
topics.hinglish: CSS ki madad se hum ek hi jagah se poori website ka design control kar sakte hain.

practice.question: Why is CSS important?
practice.answer: It improves design, responsiveness and user experience

topics.title: CSS Syntax
topics.english: CSS syntax consists of a selector and a declaration block with properties and values.
topics.hinglish: CSS me selector hota hai aur declaration block hota hai jisme property aur value hoti hai.

practice.question: What are the main parts of CSS syntax?

topics.title: Ways to Add CSS to HTML
topics.english: CSS can be added to HTML using Inline, Internal or External methods.
topics.hinglish: CSS ko HTML me Inline, Internal aur External 3 tarikon se add kiya ja sakta hai.

practice.question: Which CSS method is best practice?

topics.title: Inline CSS
topics.english: Inline CSS is written directly inside HTML tags using the style attribute.
topics.hinglish: Inline CSS HTML tag ke andar style attribute se likhi jaati hai.

practice.question: Where is inline CSS written?
practice.answer: Inside HTML tag using style attribute

topics.title: Internal CSS
topics.english: Internal CSS is written inside the style tag in the head section of HTML.
topics.hinglish: Internal CSS HTML ke head section ke andar style tag me likhi jaati hai.

practice.question: When should internal CSS be used?

topics.title: External CSS
topics.english: External CSS is written in a separate .css file and linked to HTML.
topics.hinglish: External CSS ek alag .css file me likhi jaati hai aur HTML se link hoti hai.

practice.question: Why is external CSS recommended?
practice.answer: It keeps code clean and reusable

topics.title: CSS Selectors - Basic
topics.english: Selectors are used to select HTML elements to apply styles.
topics.hinglish: Selectors HTML elements ko select karte hain styling ke liye.

practice.question: Which selector uses a dot (.)?
Which selector uses a hash (#)?

topics.title: Attribute Selectors
topics.english: Attribute selectors target elements based on attributes.
topics.hinglish: Attribute selectors attributes ke basis par elements ko select karte hain.

practice.question: What does an attribute selector target?

topics.title: Pseudo-classes
topics.english: Pseudo-classes define special states of elements.
topics.hinglish: Pseudo-classes elements ki special states ko style karte hain.

practice.question: Which pseudo-class is used on hover?

topics.title: Pseudo-elements
topics.english: Pseudo-elements style specific parts of elements.
topics.hinglish: Pseudo-elements element ke specific parts ko style karte hain.

practice.question: Which pseudo-element styles the first letter?

topics.title: CSS Comments
topics.english: Comments are notes written for developers and ignored by browsers.
topics.hinglish: Comments developer ke notes hote hain jo browser ignore karta hai.

practice.question: What symbols are used for CSS comments?

topics.title: CSS Specificity & Priority
topics.english: Specificity decides which CSS rule is applied when multiple rules target the same element.
topics.hinglish: Specificity decide karta hai ki kaunsa CSS rule apply hoga.

practice.question: Which has highest priority in CSS?

topics.title: Colors in CSS
topics.english: CSS allows you to apply colors using color names, hex codes, and RGB/RGBA values.
topics.hinglish: CSS me rang lagane ke liye color names, hex codes aur RGB/RGBA values use hoti hain.

practice.question: Which color method supports transparency?

topics.title: Backgrounds in CSS
topics.english: Background properties are used to style the background of elements using colors and images.
topics.hinglish: Background properties elements ke background ko color ya image se style karne ke liye use hoti hain.

practice.question: Which property is used to set a background image?

topics.title: CSS Box Model
topics.english: The CSS box model describes the structure of every HTML element as a rectangular box.
topics.hinglish: CSS box model har HTML element ko ek rectangular box ke roop me dekhta hai.

practice.question: What are the four parts of the CSS box model?

topics.title: Margins and Padding
topics.english: Margins control space outside the element, while padding controls space inside the element.
topics.hinglish: Margin element ke bahar ka gap hota hai, padding element ke andar ka gap hota hai.

practice.question: Which property controls space inside an element?

topics.title: Borders in CSS
topics.english: Borders surround elements and can be styled using width, style and color.
topics.hinglish: Border element ke charo taraf hota hai aur width, style aur color se control hota hai.

practice.question: Which three things are required to define a border?

topics.title: Height and Width
topics.english: Height and width properties are used to control the size of elements.
topics.hinglish: Height aur width properties element ka size control karti hain.

practice.question: Which property helps in responsive images?

topics.title: Outline in CSS
topics.english: Outline is similar to border but does not affect the size of the element.
topics.hinglish: Outline border jaisa hota hai lekin element ka size change nahi karta.

practice.question: Does outline affect box size?

topics.title: Margin vs Padding
topics.english: Padding affects the clickable area and background, margin does not.
topics.hinglish: Padding background aur clickable area ka hissa hota hai, margin nahi hota.

practice.question: Which is part of clickable area?

topics.title: Box Sizing
topics.english: box-sizing controls how total width and height of elements are calculated.
topics.hinglish: box-sizing decide karta hai ki padding aur border width me include honge ya nahi.

practice.question: Why is border-box recommended?
practice.answer: It prevents layout breaking by keeping width fixed

topics.title: Text Properties in CSS
topics.english: CSS text properties are used to align, decorate, transform and add shadow effects to text.
topics.hinglish: CSS text properties text ko align, decorate, transform aur shadow dene ke kaam aati hain.

practice.question: Which property is used to align text?
Which property removes underline from links?

topics.title: Fonts in CSS
topics.english: Font properties control the appearance of text such as font family, size and weight.
topics.hinglish: Font properties text ke font, size aur weight ko control karti hain.

practice.question: Which unit is best for responsive font sizes?

topics.title: Using Google Fonts
topics.english: Google Fonts allows developers to use custom fonts by linking them in HTML.
topics.hinglish: Google Fonts ka use custom fonts ko website me add karne ke liye hota hai.

practice.question: Why use Google Fonts?
practice.answer: To use fonts beyond default system fonts

topics.title: Icons in CSS
topics.english: Icons can be added using icon fonts like Font Awesome or Google Icons and styled like text.
topics.hinglish: Icons Font Awesome ya Google Icons se add kiye jaate hain aur text ki tarah style hote hain.

practice.question: Name one popular icon library

topics.title: Styling Links in CSS
topics.english: Links have different states that can be styled using pseudo-classes.
topics.hinglish: Links ki alag-alag states hoti hain jinhe pseudo-classes se style kiya ja sakta hai.

practice.question: Which pseudo-class styles a hovered link?

topics.title: Styling Lists in CSS
topics.english: CSS list properties control bullet style, position and custom images.
topics.hinglish: CSS list properties bullet ka style, position aur image control karti hain.

practice.question: Which property changes bullet style?

topics.title: Styling Tables in CSS
topics.english: Tables can be styled using borders, padding and row striping for better readability.
topics.hinglish: Tables ko border, padding aur striping se professional banaya jaata hai.

practice.question: Which property removes double borders in tables?

topics.title: CSS Units & Accessibility Tip
topics.english: Relative units like rem improve responsiveness and accessibility.
topics.hinglish: rem jaise relative units website ko responsive aur accessible banate hain.

practice.question: Why is rem preferred over px?
practice.answer: It scales better for responsiveness and accessibility

topics.title: Display Property in CSS
topics.english: The display property defines how an element behaves in the layout.
topics.hinglish: Display property decide karti hai ki element layout me kaise behave karega.

practice.question: Which display value allows width and height but stays inline?

topics.title: Max-width for Responsive Layouts
topics.english: max-width helps elements resize on smaller screens while keeping a maximum limit.
topics.hinglish: max-width element ko mobile screen par responsive banata hai bina overflow ke.

practice.question: Why is max-width better than fixed width?
practice.answer: It prevents horizontal scrolling on small screens

topics.title: CSS Position Property
topics.english: Position controls how elements are placed on the page.
topics.hinglish: Position property element ki jagah control karti hai.

practice.question: Which position sticks an element to the viewport?

topics.title: Z-index
topics.english: z-index controls the vertical stacking order of overlapping elements.
topics.hinglish: z-index batata hai kaunsa element upar dikhega jab overlap hota hai.

practice.question: Which element appears on top with higher z-index?
practice.answer: The element with larger z-index value

topics.title: Overflow Property
topics.english: Overflow controls what happens when content exceeds the element's box.
topics.hinglish: Overflow decide karta hai ki content box se bahar jaaye to kya hoga.

practice.question: Which overflow value hides extra content?

topics.title: Float and Clear (Legacy Layout)
topics.english: Float was used to create layouts before Flexbox and Grid.
topics.hinglish: Pehle layouts banane ke liye float ka use hota tha, ab ye legacy hai.

practice.question: Which property fixes float issues?

topics.title: Centering & Alignment Techniques
topics.english: CSS provides different ways to align and center elements.
topics.hinglish: CSS me elements ko align aur center karne ke kai tarike hote hain.

practice.question: Which method centers block elements horizontally?

topics.title: CSS Combinators
topics.english: Combinators define relationships between selectors.
topics.hinglish: Combinators selectors ke beech ka relationship batate hain.

practice.question: Which combinator selects direct children only?

topics.title: Opacity & Visual Effects
topics.english: Opacity controls the transparency level of elements from fully visible to invisible.
topics.hinglish: Opacity element ki transparency control karta hai, 0 se 1 ke beech.

practice.question: What is the opacity value for full visibility?
What is the difference between opacity and RGBA?
practice.answer: Opacity affects entire element, RGBA affects only background color

topics.title: Image Gallery with CSS
topics.english: CSS can be used to create simple image galleries using layout and hover effects.
topics.hinglish: CSS ka use karke simple image gallery banayi ja sakti hai layout aur hover effects ke saath.

practice.question: Which CSS property is commonly used to create modern galleries?

topics.title: Navigation Bars in CSS
topics.english: Navigation bars are styled lists used to create menus for websites.
topics.hinglish: Navigation bar ek styled list hoti hai jo website ke menu ke liye use hoti hai.

practice.question: Which element is commonly used to build navbars?

topics.title: Dropdown Menus
topics.english: Dropdown menus are created using hover effects and display properties.
topics.hinglish: Dropdown menus hover aur display properties se banaye jaate hain.

practice.question: Which pseudo-class is used for dropdown hover?

topics.title: Styling Forms with CSS
topics.english: Forms can be styled using padding, borders, focus states and button styling.
topics.hinglish: Forms ko padding, border aur focus states se modern banaya jaata hai.

practice.question: Which pseudo-class styles input on click?

topics.title: CSS Counters
topics.english: CSS counters are used for automatic numbering of elements.
topics.hinglish: CSS counters automatic numbering ke liye use hote hain.

practice.question: Which property initializes a CSS counter?

topics.title: Website Layout Structure
topics.english: A standard website layout includes header, navigation, content, sidebar and footer.
topics.hinglish: Standard website layout me header, navigation, content, sidebar aur footer hote hain.

practice.question: Which section holds the main content?

topics.title: Modern Layout Techniques
topics.english: Modern layouts are built using Flexbox for one-dimensional layouts and Grid for two-dimensional layouts.
topics.hinglish: Modern layouts ke liye Flexbox aur Grid ka use hota hai.

practice.question: Which layout system is best for rows and columns?

topics.title: CSS Units
topics.english: CSS units define how element sizes are measured using absolute and relative values.
topics.hinglish: CSS units batate hain ki element ka size kaise measure hoga – fixed ya responsive.

practice.question: Which unit is best for responsive font sizes?
What does vw stand for?

topics.title: CSS Specificity (Priority Rules)
topics.english: Specificity decides which CSS rule is applied when multiple rules target the same element.
topics.hinglish: Specificity decide karti hai ki kaunsa CSS rule apply hoga jab conflict ho.

practice.question: Which selector has highest priority?

topics.title: !important Rule
topics.english: The !important rule overrides all other CSS specificity rules.
topics.hinglish: !important rule saari specificity ko tod kar sabse upar aa jata hai.

practice.question: When should !important be used?

topics.title: Rounded Corners with border-radius
topics.english: border-radius is used to create rounded corners and circular elements.
topics.hinglish: border-radius corners ko gol karne aur circles banane ke liye use hota hai.

practice.question: What value makes a square element a circle?

topics.title: CSS Gradients
topics.english: Gradients create smooth color transitions between multiple colors.
topics.hinglish: Gradients multiple colors ko smoothly mix karte hain.

practice.question: Which gradient spreads from center outward?

topics.title: Box Shadows
topics.english: box-shadow adds depth and shadow effects behind elements.
topics.hinglish: box-shadow elements ke peeche depth aur shadow effect deta hai.

practice.question: Which property adds shadow to boxes?

topics.title: CSS Transforms
topics.english: Transforms move, rotate, scale or skew elements in 2D or 3D space.
topics.hinglish: Transforms elements ko rotate, move aur scale karne ke liye use hote hain.

practice.question: Which transform increases size?

topics.title: CSS Transitions
topics.english: Transitions create smooth changes between two states of an element.
topics.hinglish: Transitions changes ko smooth banate hain, jaise hover effects.

practice.question: Do transitions require a trigger?

topics.title: CSS Animations
topics.english: Animations allow elements to move automatically using keyframes.
topics.hinglish: Animations bina hover ke elements ko move ya change kar sakte hain.

practice.question: Which rule defines animation steps?

topics.title: Advanced Text Effects
topics.english: Advanced text properties control layout, overflow and writing direction.
topics.hinglish: Advanced text properties text ke overflow aur direction ko control karti hain.

practice.question: Which property adds dots (...) when text overflows?

topics.title: Transitions vs Animations
topics.english: Transitions need a trigger, while animations can run automatically with multiple steps.
topics.hinglish: Transitions trigger par chalti hain, animations apne aap aur multiple steps me chal sakti hain.

practice.question: Which one can loop infinitely?

topics.title: Tooltips in CSS
topics.english: Tooltips show small information boxes when hovering over elements.
topics.hinglish: Tooltip ek chhota info box hota hai jo hover karne par dikhta hai.

practice.question: Which pseudo-class is used to show tooltips?

topics.title: Styling and Centering Images
topics.english: Images can be centered, styled and visually modified using CSS properties.
topics.hinglish: Images ko center, style aur visually modify CSS se kiya ja sakta hai.

practice.question: How do you center an image horizontally?

topics.title: Object-fit and Object-position
topics.english: Object-fit controls how images fit inside containers without distortion.
topics.hinglish: Object-fit images ko container ke andar bina stretch hue fit karta hai.

practice.question: Which object-fit value is most commonly used?

topics.title: CSS Masking
topics.english: Masking allows images to be displayed through custom shapes.
topics.hinglish: Masking se images ko custom shapes ke andar dikhaya ja sakta hai.

practice.question: Which property is used for masking?

topics.title: Multiple Columns Layout
topics.english: CSS columns divide long text into multiple vertical columns.
topics.hinglish: CSS columns lambi text ko newspaper-style columns me baant dete hain.

practice.question: Which property sets number of columns?

topics.title: Modern Buttons Styling
topics.english: Buttons are styled using hover effects, transitions and cursor changes.
topics.hinglish: Buttons ko hover, transition aur cursor se modern banaya jaata hai.

practice.question: Which property changes mouse pointer to hand?

topics.title: Pagination Styling
topics.english: Pagination helps navigate between multiple pages and is styled using inline-block or flexbox.
topics.hinglish: Pagination multiple pages ke beech navigation ke liye hota hai.

practice.question: Which layout system is best for pagination?

topics.title: UI Control Properties
topics.english: UI control properties manage user interaction with elements.
topics.hinglish: UI control properties user ke interaction ko control karti hain.

practice.question: Which property prevents text selection?

topics.title: Responsive Images Best Practice
topics.english: Responsive images adapt to container size without overflowing.
topics.hinglish: Responsive images container ke bahar nahi jaati aur size adjust karti hain.

practice.question: Which property prevents images from overflowing?

topics.title: CSS Variables (Custom Properties)
topics.english: CSS variables allow you to store values and reuse them throughout the stylesheet.
topics.hinglish: CSS variables ek value ko naam dekar poori CSS file me reuse karne dete hain.

practice.question: Which function is used to access CSS variables?

topics.title: Modern @property Rule
topics.english: The @property rule defines the type and behavior of CSS variables and allows animation.
topics.hinglish: @property rule CSS variables ko type deta hai aur unhe animate karna possible banata hai.

practice.question: Why is @property useful?
practice.answer: It allows typed and animatable CSS variables

topics.title: Box Sizing in CSS
topics.english: box-sizing controls how width and height of elements are calculated.
topics.hinglish: box-sizing decide karta hai ki padding aur border width me include honge ya nahi.

practice.question: Which box-sizing value is recommended?

topics.title: Viewport Meta Tag
topics.english: The viewport meta tag ensures proper scaling on mobile devices.
topics.hinglish: Viewport meta tag website ko mobile par sahi scale me dikhata hai.

practice.question: Why is viewport meta tag important?
practice.answer: It makes websites responsive on mobile devices

topics.title: Responsive Web Design (RWD)
topics.english: Responsive Web Design creates layouts that adapt to different screen sizes.
topics.hinglish: RWD ka matlab website ko har device ke hisaab se adapt karna.

practice.question: Name one pillar of Responsive Web Design

topics.title: Media Queries
topics.english: Media queries apply CSS rules based on screen size and device characteristics.
topics.hinglish: Media queries screen size check karke CSS apply karti hain.

practice.question: Which media query strategy is best practice?

topics.title: Modern UI Control Features
topics.english: UI control properties manage browser behavior and user interactions.
topics.hinglish: UI control properties browser behavior aur user interaction ko control karti hain.

practice.question: Which property disables click events?

topics.title: Mobile-First vs Desktop-First Design
topics.english: Mobile-first starts design from small screens, desktop-first starts from large screens.
topics.hinglish: Mobile-first me pehle mobile ke liye design hota hai, desktop-first me pehle desktop ke liye.

practice.question: Which approach is considered best practice today?

topics.title: CSS Universal Reset
topics.english: Universal reset removes default browser spacing and ensures consistent layout.
topics.hinglish: Universal reset browser ke default margin aur padding hata deta hai.

practice.question: Why is universal reset used?
practice.answer: To ensure consistent layout across browsers

topics.title: CSS Flexbox (1-Dimensional Layout)
topics.english: Flexbox is used to align elements in a single direction: row or column.
topics.hinglish: Flexbox elements ko ek direction (row ya column) me align karne ke liye use hota hai.

practice.question: Which property starts Flexbox?
Which property controls horizontal alignment?

topics.title: Flex Item Properties
topics.english: Flex item properties control how individual items grow, shrink and align.
topics.hinglish: Flex item properties batati hain ki har item ka size aur alignment kaisa hoga.

practice.question: Which property aligns a single flex item?

topics.title: CSS Grid (2-Dimensional Layout)
topics.english: CSS Grid controls both rows and columns for complex layouts.
topics.hinglish: CSS Grid rows aur columns dono ko ek saath control karta hai.

practice.question: Which layout system is best for full page structure?

topics.title: Grid Item Properties
topics.english: Grid item properties control how elements span across rows and columns.
topics.hinglish: Grid item properties elements ko multiple rows ya columns me failane ke kaam aati hain.

practice.question: Which property spans an item across columns?

topics.title: Responsive Images and Videos
topics.english: Responsive media adapts to different screen sizes without distortion.
topics.hinglish: Responsive media har screen size par sahi shape me adjust hota hai.

practice.question: Which property maintains video ratio?

topics.title: CSS Frameworks
topics.english: CSS frameworks provide pre-written styles to speed up development.
topics.hinglish: CSS frameworks pehle se likha hua CSS code dete hain.

practice.question: Which framework is utility-first?

topics.title: CSS Templates
topics.english: Templates are pre-built website designs used for learning and rapid development.
topics.hinglish: Templates ready-made designs hote hain jinse professional layout seekha ja sakta hai.

practice.question: Why are templates useful?
practice.answer: They help understand professional design structure

topics.title: Flexbox vs CSS Grid
topics.english: Flexbox is best for aligning items, Grid is best for full layout structure.
topics.hinglish: Flexbox items align karne ke liye best hai, Grid poore layout ke liye.

practice.question: Which layout is 2-dimensional?
